content.title: The Cyborg Defamation Foundation
content.body:
Fredrick Defamont heads this organization, though it's more of a disorganized mob than the fierce mafia facade they put up...
They're composed of anyone who wants to join - provided they have a prejudice against cyborgs and aren't one themselves.
We couldn't gather much more than that before the squad got killed. Not being known gives you a huge advantage alongside the ability to easily dispatch anyone seeking information.
